org.owasp.jbrofuzz.ui
Class FuzzingPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.owasp.jbrofuzz.ui.FuzzingPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FuzzingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The main "TCP Fuzzing" panel, displayed within the Main Frame Window.

This panel performs all TCP related fuzzing operations, including the addition and removal of generators, reporting back the results into the current window, as well as writting them to file.

Version:
0.5
Author:
subere (at) uncon org
See Also:
Serialized Form

setOutputText

public void setOutputText(java.lang.String s)

Set the output text to contain the specified String, by appending that String to the already present output String value. If the total number of lines exceeds 1000, proceed to clear the original String value present within the JTextArea prior to appending the given String.

Parameters:
s - String

generatorRemoveButton

public void generatorRemoveButton()

Method for removing a generator. This method operates by removing a row from the corresponding table model of the generator table.

getCounter

public java.lang.String getCounter(boolean newCount)

Method for returning the counter held within the Sniffing Panel which is responsible for counting the number of requests having been made. This method is used for generating unique sequential file name and row counts.

Parameters:
newCount - boolean Increment the counter by 1
Returns:
String
